alert.note: Alert for Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:46PM EST until January 10 at 1:33PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County. For the Dan River...including Wentworth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River near Wentworth. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.5 feet, Dan Valley Road and River Road in Madison are closed by floodwaters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 19.4 feet just after midnight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM EST.
